name: Rosette Couture Ivory Rosettes and Rhinestone Bobby Pin
description:
May there always be roses pinned to you. This small rosette bobby pin, made in ivory shantung silk has three sweet little roses and a delicate touch of a rhinestone embellishment.  It measures 1.75 by 1.75 inches in diameter ~ it works beautifully solo or clustered with others.  Constructed with a premium bar pin, simply pin to yourself and go.  Experiment with placement in your hair, on your shirt, handbag, lace headband, cloth napkins, baskets, friends and more.  Enjoy the options ~ customize your rose collection, and your life, daily.

Thank you for browsing Brydferth,
Hailey Rose
{Celebrate Beautifully ~ Live Romantically}

name: Rosette Couture Silk Earrings Sterling Silver .. Fuchsia Pink
description:
Delight your friends with sweet little roses for their ears. This set of bold fuchsia pink silk handmade roses are mounted on sterling silver studs from Spain. They measure .75 inches in diameter. Perfect for birthday parties, girlfriend travels, bridal parties, party favors and more.

Thank you for browsing Brydferth,
Hailey Rose
{Celebrate Beautifully ~ Live Romantically}

name: Rosette Couture .. Sweet Green Silk .. Bobby Pin or Brooch
description:
May there always be roses in your life. This single rosette is available as a brooch or bobby pin and is made in sweet green shantung silk.  Select the size your heart desires to the right. ~ Embellish your day with a solo rose or cluster them.  Constructed with a premium bar pin or antique brass bobby pin (per your request), simply pin and go. Experiment with placement on your favorite sweater, cardigan, skirt, jacket, handbag, lace headband, in your hair, cloth napkins, baskets, friends and more. Enjoy the options ~ customize your rose collection, and your life, daily. 

The back of the rose is neatly finished in a natural 100% pure linen fabric.  The back and edges are all neatly hand sewn and nicely finished. 

~Please note that the beauty of handmade reflects in each rose meaning each rose will be slightly different from the picture in its folds and shapes. 

Thank you for browsing Brydferth,
Hailey Rose
{Celebrate Beautifully ~ Live Romantically}

name: Rosette Couture Shoe Clip Set .. Baby Pink
description:
May there be roses at your feet and happiness in your heart. This pair of rosette shoe clips are made of baby pink shantung silk.  Measuring 2 inches in diameter and constructed with premium quality Bluette Shoe Clips, made in France, simply clip to your shoes and go. Experiment with placement on the front, side and back of your shoes as well as on ankle straps. Other places to clip to: Clothing, handbags, books, cloth napkins, hot air balloons, horses and more. Enjoy the options ~ customize your shoe collection, and your life, daily.

The beauty of handmade reflects in each rose meaning each rose will be slightly different from the picture in its folds and shapes.  

Thank you for browsing Brydferth,
